channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 04:08 Drive alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 🟢 04:08 Drive alarm to Sumy Oblast.Creck on further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
